title: Hugo's
description: Serves meat, veg options available. An upscale place in Houston's Montrose area that makes regional Mexican cuisine. Has a vegetarian menu, ask for it. The appetizers contain dairy and/or egg, but the vegetarian enchiladas can be made vegan upon request, and the vegetarian tacos are vegan suitable. Servers are knowledgeable about which items can be prepared vegan. Price range is moderate for vegetarian menu to more expensive for regular menu.
